author: cargilld
msg: Change platform mutex code to do a panic instead of throwing an exception as the exception code uses mutexes and this can result in infinite recursion.

author: knoaman
msg: Performance: do not make a copy of the expression to match.

msg: Implement version of lowercase that only check a to z, instead of all characters, and don't rely on functionality provided in the transcoders.
